description: Powers of 2 grouped in pairs of 2 digits (version 2).
maple: sq:=[]: for n from 0 to 100 do s:=convert(2^n,base,10): l:=nops(s): sq:=[op(sq),seq(s[l-i],i=0..l-1)] od: seq(sq[2*i-1]*10+sq[2*i],i=1..100); (C. Ronaldo)
author: Alexei Kozlowski (bros(AT)spf.minsk.by)
extensions: More terms from C. Ronaldo (aga_new_ac(AT)hotmail.com), Jan 03 2005
